name: creative-agency-area
description: You're in the Agency Den. There's a tang of creativity (or is that printer toner?) in the air and the sound of clicks being converted to cash.

exits.description:
You crawl into the small hole under Dave's desk and find yourself briefly plunged into darkness.
After a second or so of vertigo you come to your senses somewhere outside.

inventory.name: desk
inventory.detailedDescription: On first glimpse, it's a standard wood-effect office desk but you feel an overwhelming urge to do a double-take.

linkedexits.description:

inventory.name: tears
inventory.detailedDescription:
They're the residue of tears of frustration - probably from years of dealing with email marketing campaigns.
Nobody should have to work with email marketing for that long and be expected to stay entirely sane.

attributes.smell: You vaguely sense a tang of salt and blood around them.
attributes.sound: Wow, that's disturbing. It takes quite a spiritual imprint to leave the sound of tears.

inventory.name: spam
inventory.detailedDescription:
It's a leftover from a training course a few years ago. It says 'best before end: November 2015.
I thought this stuff lasted forever!

attributes.smell: You wonder to yourself if cats like Spam.

attributes.defaultResult: It's just a smell, not something you can keep - except in your memory and imagination.
attributes.smell:
Sharpies. You can smell sharpies.
Sharpies smell of ideas!

inventory.name: clicks
inventory.detailedDescription: Even when there's nobody here the clicks keep coming.

attributes.defaultResult: If you listen, you might just get it.
